regen.absent_element: handling of invalid or malicious input from players
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer shall validate and sanitize all input from players to prevent cheating or disruption of the game.

regen.absent_element: saving log information to a file
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer will save log information to a file for future reference.

regen.absent_element: handling of invalid or malicious input from clients
regen.new_specification: The MultiMahjongServer shall validate and sanitize all input from clients to prevent cheating, hacking, or other forms of exploitation.

label: The MultiMahjongServer will have a graphical user interface with which the administrator can get log information.
absence: getting log information by administrator through a graphical user interface
